title: Permanent Skin Shards Disenchant Essence
body:
How come when you get a permanent skin shard from rerolling, disenchanting it is the same as if you were disenchanting 1 skin shard of the same type?

Or am I just mistaken in what I think; because if so shouldn't you get triple the essence.

replies.body: Because you're not re rolling to get essence you're doing it for a skin
